name: LarryBlock
description:
A Twitter bot that blocks users who interact with you and
    follow certain Twitter accounts

ANYONE_FOLLOWING.description:
A comma-separated list of Twitter
      screen names. If someone who mentions or follows you follows anyone
      on that list, it will block them automatically.

TWITTER_USERNAME.description:
The Twitter username you want to use
      this tool with

TWITTER_CONSUMER_KEY.description:
Twitter OAuth Consumer Key from
      apps.twitter.com

TWITTER_CONSUMER_SECRET.description:
Twitter OAuth Consumer Secret
      from apps.twitter.com

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN.description:
Twitter OAuth Access Token from
      apps.twitter.com (generate one after making your app read & write)

TWITTER_ACCESS_TOKEN_SECRET.description:
Twitter OAuth Access Token
      from apps.twitter.com (generate one after making your app read & write)
